title: 2bd 2ba, Separate dining area, Henderson NV
posting_body: Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.
Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!

Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Mountain views-Separate dining area-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Oversized closets-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms-Polished kitchen countertops

Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball-State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity-Onsite playground-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:
Only a small one-time payment-Professional onsite management-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance
